name: German Body Composition (GBC)
time_per_session_breakdown: Supersets with short rests, about 25-30 min of main work
overview_and_execution: Alternate upper & lower exercises in supersets (A1/A2) with minimal rest (~30s) to boost metabolic stress and fat-burning. Typically 3-4 supersets of 8-15 reps each.
example_application: A1: Front Squat 10 reps, rest 30s, A2: Chin-ups 10 reps, rest 30s, repeat for 3-4 rounds.
important_notes: Short rest, emphasis on hypertrophy and metabolic effect. Good for body recomposition phases.
volume_metrics: Each superset ~8-15 reps Ã— 3-4 sets per exercise
